en.transcript_instruction: <transcript> contains the call transcript between the agent and the customer. Please answer based on this transcript.

consultation_summary.name: Consultation Summary
consultation_summary.description: Generate a detailed summary of the recorded consultation.

consultation_notes.name: Consultation Notes
consultation_notes.description: Adjust the summary format to extract only necessary information.

email_reply.name: Email Reply
email_reply.description: Generate a reply email to be sent to the customer.

consultation_quality.name: Consultation Quality
consultation_quality.description: Review the transcript for detailed compliance and quality.

ko.transcript_instruction: <transcript> 에는 상담원과 고객간의 통화 녹취가 기록되어 있습니다. 이 녹취를 바탕으로 답변해주세요.

consultation_notes.name: 상담 노트
consultation_notes.description: 필요한 정보만 발췌할 수 있도록 요약 형식을 조정하세요.

consultation_quality.name: 상담 품질
consultation_quality.description: 녹취에 대한 상세한 규정준수 및 품질을 검토합니다.
